name: The Portuguese Ocean
description:
A snake like game that you control a Portguese ship, Try to get your best score and challenge your friends to beat your high Score!

Use the Arrows of the keyboard to control the Portugal Flag, Don't hit the Spain and France flags and grab the portugese coins

Use as setas do teclado para controlar a bandeira portuguesa, não bata nas bandeiras da Espanha e França e pegue as moedas portuguesas
